price: Ṣé ó ń ṣe àdéhùn fún yín pé nígbà tí ẹ bá kú, tí ẹ sì di erùpẹ̀ àti egungun tán, dájúdájú wọn yóò mu yín jáde (ní alààyè)?
arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ إِذَا مِتُّمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ayaʿidukum annakum idhā mittum wakuntum turāban waʿiẓāman annakum mukh'rajūna
